sent.orig: Is not for any repayment, therefore the concern, will not be for any tomorrow therefore anticipation.
sent.trans: 不是为了什么回报所以关怀，不是为了什么明天所以期待。

sent.orig: She's beautiful and therefore to be woo'd She is a woman, therefore to be won.
sent.trans: 因为她生的美丽，所以被男人追求；因为她是女人，所以被男人俘获。

sent.orig: God says to man,"I heal you therefore I hurt, love you therefore punish."
sent.trans: 神对人说：“我医治你所以伤害你，爱你所以惩罚你。”

sent.orig: Therefore, we had the first distinct experience to the white Algeria.
sent.trans: 因此，我对白色的阿尔及利亚有了第一次真切的休会。

sent.orig: Therefore the generators drive the synthesis, more or less.
sent.trans: 因此发生器水晶推动合成，更大或更小。
